name: TC_0408 When you click on the "VEHİCLEDOCUMENT " heading, the relevant page should appear and when we add a new company personnel, it should be added without any problems and the added Personnel should be listed on the right.
description: "When we add a new company document, it should be added without any problems and the added document should be listed on the right."

steps.name: Given  Login to HYBS site, click the Login button and log in with your User information.
*  User should be able to click on OPERATION MODULE
*  The user clicks on the COMPANY LIST link and goes to the relevant page, and it is tested that the information about the companies is listed."
*  click on the inspect eye icon
*  the user clicks on the VEHICLEDOCUMENT link and the user verifies that the company information is correctly loaded
*  the user enters VEHICLEDOCUMENT new information the user verifies that the information is enter
